synthesis_conditions.washing_method: washed with chloroform for three times

synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Upon irradiation with blue light (455 nm) in the presence of TEA vapor, the red Zr-PDI powder turned black in 10 min. The absorption spectrum of Zr-PDI(cid:129)− displays three new peaks at 778, 917, and 1008 nm, characteristic peaks of PDI(cid:129)− produced by PET.
